item.title: Federal judge appointed by Trump quits group over statement on threats
item.description: Trump-appointed Judge James Ho said he resigned from the Federal Judges Association over a "merely sanctimonious" statement on judicial threats.

item.title: GOP lawmaker calls trans Dem 'Mr. McBride,' abruptly ends hearing after ultimatum from another Dem
item.description: Rep. Keith Self abruptly ended a hearing on Tuesday after Rep. Bill Keating objected to Self referring to Rep. Sarah McBride as "Mr. McBride."
